EmailTemplate.name: 202103_APAC_ATR_APU-131-9A_Webinar_Teams.1.APU 131 9A Webinar Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: A closer look at APU 131-9A
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Join your Honeywell In-Service Engineers for a regional webinar covering the latest technical updates on product performance improvements.
An auxiliary power unit (APU) is a critical piece of aircraft equipment that provides electrical power and air conditioning while the plane is on the ground to ensure increased passenger comfort, and supplies the air source when a pilot is ready to start the main engines. The 131-9A is known for its reliability and lower maintenance costs over the course of its entire life cycle, resulting in significant fuel savings each year. REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/03/airlines-technical-webinar-apu-131-9a-apac]]>
